模块 com.ae2dms.bubblebobble
程序包 com.ae2dms.BubbleBobble.UnitState

接口 HeroState

所有已知实现类:
InvincibleState, NormalState, ShieldingState, StunnedState
public interface HeroState
The HeroState interface uses state pattern.

It shows the state of Hero, and contains four state transition methods.

另请参阅:
InvincibleState, NormalState, ShieldingState, StunnedState

  • 方法概要

    修饰符和类型
    方法
    说明
    void
    invincible()
    translates current state into invincible state
    void
    recover()
    translates current state into normal state
    void
    shield()
    translates current state into shield state
    void
    stun()
    translates current state into stunned state
    String
    toString()
    a literal representation of the current state.
